profiles.label: Security Level 1 (Wazuh baseline)
profiles.description: Preview profile for endpoint hardening checks derived from the Wazuh compliance baseline.

rules.source: Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DeviceInstall\Restrictions" -Name "DenyDeviceIDs" -Value 1 -Type DWord -Force; New-Item -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DeviceInstall\Restrictions\DenyDeviceIDs" -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DeviceInstall\Restrictions\DenyDeviceIDs" -Name "1" -Value "SBP2\*" -Type String -Force
